info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 9:58PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATIONS POSSIBLE LATE THIS EVENING IN ALEXANDER COUNTY... Light to moderate snow showers developing across the North Carolina northwest Piedmont will affect Alexander County late this evening, and possible into the early overnight, before ending from the west. The snow showers could become heavy enough at times to permit a dusting to a half inch of snow to accumulate on some surfaces as temperatures cool below the freezing mark. Slippery conditions could develop on a few bridges and overpasses across the county overnight, especially as temperatures fall through the 20s during the early morning hours. Use caution if traveling.
